changes: Added German language support for Occult Crescent map
Other bugfixes
Added EXP needed to level up each Phantom Job.
Added and verified locations for all Occult Crescent South Horn map entries

Note: There are three carrot spawn locations that I haven't been able to verify, but also haven't been able to disprove. If you see a carrot spawn at (27.8, 9.3), (29.3, 38.4), or (20.8, 37.7), or a spot that isn't on the map, please let me know.

Thank you for all your support! I'm really happy that this site has been a useful resource for people while they explore Occult Crescent, as well as Bozja and Eureka. If you see anything that doesn't look right, or have a suggestion, feel free to contact me on Discord at @lynnkaneko.
